metadata.purpose: Notion database entries for Cursor MM1 Agent Work Audit findings
metadata.note: Notion API had parameter validation issues. These entries should be manually created or imported via a working integration.

properties.Name: AUDIT: Cursor MM1 Agent Work Audit - Critical Deficiencies Found (2026-01-12)
properties.Description:
Comprehensive audit of Cursor MM1 Agent conversation history from January 8, 2026 revealed 2 CRITICAL, 3 MAJOR, and 4 MINOR deficiencies.

**CRITICAL FINDINGS:**
1. C1: Incorrect Line Number References - Agent claimed code changes at lines 7074-7095, but actual changes at lines 8691-8706 (1,600 lines off)
2. C2: No Testing Execution - Agent claimed code is production-ready but testing was marked PENDING

**MAJOR FINDINGS:**
- M1: User frustration events during session
- M2: Fallback chain timeout issues (90+ seconds on SoundCloud)
- M3: Spotify API function reference errors in prompts (get_spotify_client() doesn't exist)

**AUDIT SCORES:**
- Work Completion: 7/10
- Documentation Quality: 6/10
- Accuracy: 5/10
- Testing Rigor: 3/10
- User Experience: 4/10
- Overall: 5/10

Full audit report: /Users/brianhellemn/Projects/github-production/reports/CURSOR_MM1_AGENT_WORK_AUDIT_20260112.md

properties.Name: REMEDIATION: Update Spotify track fix documentation with correct line numbers
properties.Description:
Update all documentation files that reference Spotify track fix code to use correct line numbers (8691-8706 instead of 7074-7095).

Files to update:
- SPOTIFY_TRACK_FIX_AUDIT_REPORT.md
- SPOTIFY_TRACK_FIX_ISSUE2_RESOLUTION.md
- SPOTIFY_TRACK_FIX_HANDOFF_SUMMARY.md
- Handoff JSON file in Claude Code Agent inbox

Verification: grep -n 'is_duplicate.*result\.get' soundcloud_download_prod_merge-2.py should return line 8692

properties.Name: REMEDIATION: Execute Spotify track processing test cases
properties.Description:
Execute the test cases defined in the Spotify track fix handoff to verify production readiness.

Test Cases:
1. Test Spotify track with existing YouTube URL in Notion - should use that URL
2. Test Spotify track without YouTube URL - should search YouTube and find match
3. Test Spotify track that is a known duplicate - should skip and mark as duplicate
4. Test full end-to-end workflow with real Spotify track

Create SPOTIFY_TRACK_FIX_TEST_RESULTS.md with execution results

properties.Name: REMEDIATION: Update Music Track Sync prompts with correct Spotify API usage
properties.Description:
Update Music Track Sync system prompts to remove references to non-existent get_spotify_client() function.

Location: Music Track Sync workflow prompts
Issue: Prompts reference get_spotify_client() which doesn't exist in the codebase
Impact: Fallback chain failures when agents try to use this function

Required: Replace with actual Spotify API integration pattern used in soundcloud_download_prod_merge-2.py
